Generated Narrative: CodeSystem medcom-observation-codes

Language: da-DK

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeURITypeDescription
statusstatushttp://hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties#statuscodeA property that indicates the status of the concept. One of experimental, active, deprecated, retired. Find Governance for MedCom Terminology in the 'Home' tab.
effectiveDateeffectiveDatehttp://hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties#effectiveDatedateTimeThe date at which the code status was last changed.

Concepts

This case-insensitive code system http://medcomfhir.dk/ig/terminology/CodeSystem/medcom-observation-codes defines the following codes:
